forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 53F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
